TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Stroke extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 代表單一筆墨筆劃。

span.span: Represents a single ink stroke.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是指標裝置，例如 tablet 畫筆或滑鼠從收集的資料物件。A is the data object that is collected from a pointing device, such as a tablet pen or a mouse. 可建立及操作以程式設計的方式，以及可代表以視覺化方式上的筆墨啟用項目，例如。The can be created and manipulated programmatically, and can be represented visually on an ink-enabled element, such as the . A包含其位置和外觀的相關資訊。A contains information about both its position and appearance. 屬性為集合的物件，指定的位置。The property is a collection of objects that specifies the position of the . 屬性會指定筆劃的外觀。The property specifies a stroke's appearance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得的手寫筆點時使用屬性屬性設定為`true`，使用方法。To get the stylus points that are used when the property on the property is set to `true`, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 指派給屬性必須有至少一個中。The assigned to the property must have at least one in it. 如果您嘗試將指派空至，或移除所有物件從，發生例外狀況。If you try to assign an empty to , or remove all the objects from , an exception occurs. ## Examples 下列範例是透過覆寫的一部分繪製在每個圓圈。The following example is part of an overridden that draws a circle at each . 如果屬性設定為`true`、用來取得手寫筆的點。If the property is set to `true`, the is used to get the stylus points. 否則，屬性使用。Otherwise, the property is used. MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Transform (System.Windows.Media.Matrix transformMatrix, bool applyToStylusTip);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Transform(valuetype System.Windows.Media.Matrix transformMatrix, bool applyToStylusTip) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Transform (transformMatrix As Matrix, applyToStylusTip As Boolean)
public: virtual void Transform(System::Windows::Media::Matrix transformMatrix, bool applyToStylusTip);

param.name: transformMatrix
param.span: 定義轉換的 物件。

span.span: The object defining the transformation.

param.name: applyToStylusTip
param.span: 如果要套用轉換至手寫筆筆尖，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to apply the transformation to the tip of the stylus; otherwise, .

summary.span: 根據指定的 物件執行轉換。

span.span: Performs a transformation based upon the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件代表 3x3 矩陣，可用於二維空間中的轉換。The object represents a 3x3 matrix used for transformations in two-dimensional space. 透過提供的矩陣轉換 Stroke 物件的每個點。Each point of the Stroke object is transformed by the supplied Matrix. 例如如果原始 Point.X 值 100，則原始 Point.Y 值是 55 和轉換 Matrix.Scale （0.5，0.5）、 新 Point.X 值為 50，且新 Point.Y 值為 27.5。For example if the original Point.X value is 100, the original Point.Y value is 55, and the transformation Matrix.Scale(0.5, 0.5), the new Point.X value is 50 and the new Point.Y value is 27.5. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將轉換物件。The following example demonstrates how to transform a object. [!code-csharp[DrawTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawTransform/CSharp/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DrawTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawTransform/VisualBasic/Module1.vb#1)]
